title: WatchGuard security advisory (AV25-677)
description: On September 17, 2025, WatchGuard published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following product:
products: Fireware OS  version 11.10.2 to 11.12.4_Update1, version 12.0 to 12.11.3, and version 2025.1.
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
